alert.note: Alert for Extreme Western Allegany (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 26 at 10:08PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT NORTHWESTERN ALLEGANY COUNTY... At 1006 PM EST, snow showers were located along Interstate 68 in Garrett County, moving east around 20 mph. Periods of snow along with strong winds around 30 to 40 mph are expected. Visibility may be reduced to around one-half mile at times, and any untreated surfaces will be coated with snow. Locations impacted include... Frostburg, La Vale, Cresaptown, Eckhart Mines, Mount Savage, Ellerslie, Corriganville, Midland, Midlothian and Woodland. This includes Interstate 68 in Maryland between mile markers 31 and 39. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
